/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A brick wall runs along the right side of the street, adding a touch of rustic charm to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
